body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Luxe Stays customer support. My name is Vincent Evans. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Joyce. Can I verify your email address and phone number for account identification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email is j.carter@email.com and my phone number is zero five five five, eight eight one, two two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, that's j.carter@email.com and zero five five five, eight eight one, two two three four. Could you also provide your date of birth and home address for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my date of birth is the fourth of January, nineteen eighty five, and my home address is two three four Elm Street, Anytown, USA.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, the fourth of January, one nine eight five, and your home address is two three four Elm Street, Anytown, USA. Thank you, Joyce, for providing that information.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joyce, for your time and cooperation. Please let us know if you need any further assistance. Have a great day.
